segments.text: Excuse me , what's the checking time for flight FA1187 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you paid the airport fee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and I have already gone through the safety inspection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , please get your passport and boarding card ready . Just wait in the terminal for twenty more minutes.You will hear the announcement .
segments.speaker: S2
